sorcer.service

Interface Contexter<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Context<T>, InclusiveContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayContext, ComprehensiveContext, ControlContext, ListContext, PositionalContext, ServiceContext, SharedAssociativeContext, SharedIndexedContext

    public interface Contexter<T>
extends Remote
    A service interface related to Context evaluation/invocation and accessing contexts of of context service providers. A context provider that can federate with relevant service providers to provide associative data in the network.
